p: Thank you for submitting your work entitled "Stochastic processes dominate the within and between host evolution of influenza virus" for consideration by eLife. Your article has been reviewed by three peer reviewers, one of whom, Richard A Neher, is a member of our Board of Reviewing Editors, and the evaluation has been overseen by a Senior Editor. The following individuals involved in review of your submission have agreed to reveal their identity: Katia Koelle (Reviewer #2); Christopher J R Illingworth (Reviewer #3).
